thread.title: USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave
thread.title_full: USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave

title: USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave
text: > Top News USC fires Steve Sarkisian 1 day after putting coach on leave FILE - In this Sept. 5, 2015, file photo, Southern California head coach Steve Sarkisian yells from the sideline during the first half of an NCAA college football game against Arkansas State in Los Angeles. USC fired Sarkisian one day after the troubled coach was put on leave. Athletic director Pat Haden announced his decision Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in a brief statement. (AP Photo/Danny Moloshok, File)
